name: Hammertime
description: The goal of the game is to touch MC Hammer and reach new high scores. Obstacles periodically spawn from MC Hammer and it is the players job to dodge all of the obstacles yet still touch MC Hammer. If the player hits an obstacle, he or she will have the choice to quit the game or restart from level 1. If the player hits MC Hammer, he or she will advance to the next level. Each level will be more difficult than previous levels.
